actions.committee: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.

official_title: A bill to amend the act commonly known as the Black Bass Act to provide further protection for steelhead trout.

summary.text: Steelhead Trout Protection Act - States that notwithstanding any Indian treaty, laws and regulations of a State prohibiting or restricting the taking or sale of steelhead trout for commercial purposes shall apply to Indians and Indian tribes in the same manner and to the same extent as such laws and regulations apply to other persons.

titles.title: A bill to amend the act commonly known as the Black Bass Act to provide further protection for steelhead trout.
